means: 模棱两可的言辞，暧昧的词句

PerfectNetExp.abs: amphibolia 不稳定期amphibology 模棱两可amphichroic reaction 两性反应
amphibolite 闪岩amphibology 模棱言辞amphibolous 暧昧的

list.abs: ...歧义句构（amphibology, amphiboly）或歧义结构系指因歧义的文法结构，导致一个句子能以多种不同方式理解的情形。== 示例 ==* 小明还欠债三万元「还」可解作「归还」，或解作「还是」。* 他是我刚认识的小明的哥哥可解作「我刚认识的小明」「的哥哥」.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French amphibologie, from late Latin amphibologia, from Latin amphibolia, from Greek amphibolos 'ambiguous' (see amphibole)

means.word_mean: 1. an ambiguous grammatical construction; e.g., `they are flying planes' can mean either that someone is flying planes or that something is flying planes
